hero.title: Magical Book for Amazing Kids
hero.description: Discover fascinating stories and embark on amazing adventures. Suitable for all reading levels, from beginners to advanced readers.

error.title: Failed to Load Categories
error.description: Unable to fetch book categories at this time.

empty.title: No Categories Available
empty.description: There are currently no book categories to display.

error.title: Whops! Something went wrong
error.description: It seems that the application is experiencing technical difficulties

page404.title: Page Not Found
page404.description: It appears that the page you are looking for has been moved or does not exist

warningDevTools.title: Developer Tools Detected
warningDevTools.description: We've detected that developer tools or console is open. Please close it to continue using this page.
warningDevTools.info: This security measure helps protect the content on this page. If you believe this is an error, please contact support.
